name: Dice Try
description:
A simple game of luck and strategy, where you determine the faces of your die.

You have three 60-second rounds to roll around and collect up to six faces! Die faces can't be replaced if they already have a value, so use that to your advantage to sneak past those worthless 1's and pick up more valuable faces!
After each round, your custom die will be rolled  and the result will be added to your score. Collected faces are gone from the map between rounds, which could be used as part of your strategy!

Controls:
- WASD to move
- R to restart
